name: Welcome To Sumo Logic
body:
# Getting started with Sumo Logic

The Sumo Logic solution provides everything you need to conduct real-time forensics and log management for all of your IT dataâ€”without having to perform complex installations or upgrades, and without the need to manage and scale any hardware or storage. With fully elastic scalability, Sumo Logic is a fit for any size deployment.

**To get started using Sumo Logic:**
1. Register for an account at www.SumoLogic.com.
2. Sign into the Sumo Logic service using your account credentials.
3. Install a Collector.
4. Add a Source to the Collector.
5. Get started searching and analyzing your data set.

Sumo Logic customers can also search our knowledge base and customer forums. If you don't find what you're looking for, please let us know by contacting Sumo Logic Customer Support.

Thanks for choosing Sumo Logic!
